properties.name: TextColorIndex
properties.comment: Index of the selected color for the text from the FGSignSettings color data array

properties.name: BackgroundColorIndex
properties.comment: Index of the selected color for the background from the FGSignSettings color data array

properties.name: SignText
properties.comment: Text to be displayed on the sign

name: AFGBuildableSignWall
comment: Represents a wall that contains sign elements and is interactable

methods.name: SetSignData
methods.comment: Called by server or client to update sign data

methods.name: UpdateSignElements
methods.comment: Updates all sign elements with currently set sign data

methods.name: UpdateBackgroundMaterial
methods.comment: Updates background material on static mesh instance

methods.name: UpdateSignText
methods.comment: Force an update on the text render component

properties.name: mSignDisplayRoot
properties.comment: Root Component that holds all the sign elements, text, mesh etc.

properties.name: mTextDisplayRoot
properties.comment: Root component that parents the text objects
